result.eng: Are you coming in?

result.eng: The boat was approaching the quay and, before long, they were on dry land again.
result.ga: Bhí an bád ag druidim isteach sa ché agus sul i bhfad bhí siad ar thalamh tirim arís

result.eng: It is always difficult to enter new markets.

result.eng: Entry free of charge.

result.ponchtml: Cead isteaċ saor in aisceEntry free of charge.

result.eng: The example sentences will help you to weave the words naturally into your own speech.

result.orig: Cuideoidh na habairtí samplacha leat na focail a fhí isteach i do chuid cainte go nádúrtha

result.eng: Submit the documents along with the application.

result.eng: We cannot bring it in because of how big it is.
result.ga: Ní féidir linn é a thabhairt isteach toisc a mhéad atá sé
result.orig: Ní féidir linn é a thabhairt isteach toisc a mhéad atá sé

result.ponchtml: Ní féidir linn é a ṫaḃairt isteaċ toisc a ṁéad atá séWe cannot bring it in because of how big it is.

result.eng: He ran into the room.
result.ga: Rith sé isteach sa seomra

result.html: Rith sé isteach sa seomraHe ran into the room.
result.ponchtml: Riṫ sé isteaċ sa seomraHe ran into the room.

result.eng: A story about a little girl who goes to the wood.
result.ga: Scéal faoi chailín beag a théann isteach sa choill

result.html: Scéal faoi chailín beag a théann isteach sa choillA story about a little girl who goes to the wood.

result.eng: We happened to be talking about you just when you came in.
result.ga: Tharla go raibh muid ag caint fútsa díreach nuair a tháinig tú isteach
result.orig: Tharla go raibh muid ag caint fútsa díreach nuair a tháinig tú isteach

result.ponchtml: Ṫarla go raiḃ muid ag caint fútsa díreaċ nuair a ṫáinig tú isteaċWe happened to be talking about you just when you came in.

result.eng: The post would come at around 7:45 every morning.

result.ponchtml: Ṫáinig an post isteaċ um 7 45 gaċ maidinThe post would come at around 7:45 every morning.

result.eng: Hello to you too. Come in. How are you?

result.eng: Come in. What's your name? I am Máire.
result.ga: Tar isteach Cad is ainm duit Is mise Máire

result.eng: Come here! Into the kitchen with you!
result.ga: Gabh i leith uait Isteach an chisteanach leat

result.eng: Come on in, friends.

result.orig: Tagaigí isteach a chairde

result.ponchtml: Tagaigí isteaċ a ċairdeCome on in, friends.

result.eng: They left their clothes behind and off they went into the cold water.
result.ga: D'fhág siad a gcuid éadaí ina ndiaidh agus isteach leo san uisce fuar
result.orig: D'fhág siad a gcuid éadaí ina ndiaidh agus isteach leo san uisce fuar

result.eng: She skidded and fell head-first into the water.
result.ga: Shleamhnaigh sí is thit ar mhullach a cinn isteach san uisce
result.orig: Shleamhnaigh sí is thit ar mhullach a cinn isteach san uisce

result.ponchtml: Ṡleaṁnaiġ sí is ṫit ar ṁullaċ a cinn isteaċ san uisceShe skidded and fell head-first into the water.

result.eng: You had to crouch down to get in there.
result.ga: Bhí ort dul síos ar do chromada chun dul isteach ann
result.orig: Bhí ort dul síos ar do chromada chun dul isteach ann
result.html: Bhí ort dul síos ar do chromada chun dul isteach annYou had to crouch down to get in there.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí ort dul síos ar do ċromada ċun dul isteaċ annYou had to crouch down to get in there.

result.eng: "What's wrong with you?" called Norma-Jean when Rebekka chucked the bowl into the sink.
result.ga: Cad atá cearr leat a scairt Norma-Jean nuair a chaith Rebekka an babhla isteach sa doirteal de ráig
result.orig: Cad atá cearr leat a scairt Norma-Jean nuair a chaith Rebekka an babhla isteach sa doirteal de ráig
result.html: Cad atá cearr leat a scairt Norma-Jean nuair a chaith Rebekka an babhla isteach sa doirteal de ráig"What's wrong with you?" called Norma-Jean when Rebekka chucked the bowl into the sink.
result.ponchtml: Cad atá cearr leat a scairt Norma-Jean nuair a ċaiṫ Rebekka an baḃla isteaċ sa doirteal de ráig"What's wrong with you?" called Norma-Jean when Rebekka chucked the bowl into the sink.

result.eng: She went into the storage place crouching.
result.ga: Chuaigh sí isteach san ionad stórála ar a cromada
result.orig: Chuaigh sí isteach san ionad stórála ar a cromada
result.html: Chuaigh sí isteach san ionad stórála ar a cromadaShe went into the storage place crouching.
result.ponchtml: Ċuaiġ sí isteaċ san ionad stórála ar a cromadaShe went into the storage place crouching.

result.eng: He was looking at the door as if the devil himself could come in any minute.
result.ga: Bhí sé ag breathnú ar an doras amhail is go bhféadfadh an t-áibhirseoir féin teacht isteach nóiméad ar bith
result.orig: Bhí sé ag breathnú ar an doras amhail is go bhféadfadh an t-áibhirseoir féin teacht isteach nóiméad ar bith
result.html: Bhí sé ag breathnú ar an doras amhail is go bhféadfadh an t-áibhirseoir féin teacht isteach nóiméad ar bithHe was looking at the door as if the devil himself could come in any minute.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí sé ag breaṫnú ar an doras aṁail is go ḃféadfaḋ an t-áiḃirseoir féin teaċt isteaċ nóiméad ar biṫHe was looking at the door as if the devil himself could come in any minute.

result.eng: She thought punctuality didn't suit the American Indian perspective on life.
result.ga: Shíl sí nár thit poncúlacht isteach le dearcadh saoil na Meiriceánach Dúchasach
result.orig: Shíl sí nár thit poncúlacht isteach le dearcadh saoil na Meiriceánach Dúchasach

result.ponchtml: Ṡíl sí nár ṫit poncúlaċt isteaċ le dearcaḋ saoil na Meiriceánaċ DúċasaċShe thought punctuality didn't suit the American Indian perspective on life.

result.eng: She lifted her blouse to slip the nipple of her breast in her daughter's mouth.
result.ga: D'ardaigh sí a geansaí chun didín a cíche a shá isteach i mbéal a hiníne
result.orig: D'ardaigh sí a geansaí chun didín a cíche a shá isteach i mbéal a hiníne
result.html: D'ardaigh sí a geansaí chun didín a cíche a shá isteach i mbéal a hiníneShe lifted her blouse to slip the nipple of her breast in her daughter's mouth.
result.ponchtml: D'ardaiġ sí a geansaí ċun didín a cíċe a ẛá isteaċ i mbéal a hiníneShe lifted her blouse to slip the nipple of her breast in her daughter's mouth.

result.eng: Two jets flew in from the United States.
result.ga: D'eitil dhá scairdeitleán isteach ó na Stáit Aontaithe
result.orig: D'eitil dhá scairdeitleán isteach ó na Stáit Aontaithe
result.html: D'eitil dhá scairdeitleán isteach ó na Stáit AontaitheTwo jets flew in from the United States.
result.ponchtml: D'eitil ḋá scairdeitleán isteaċ ó na Stáit AontaiṫeTwo jets flew in from the United States.

result.eng: They left the airplane and went inside the other one.
result.ga: D'fhág siad an t-eitleán agus chuaigh isteach sa cheann eile
result.orig: D'fhág siad an t-eitleán agus chuaigh isteach sa cheann eile
result.html: D'fhág siad an t-eitleán agus chuaigh isteach sa cheann eileThey left the airplane and went inside the other one.
result.ponchtml: D'ḟág siad an t-eitleán agus ċuaiġ isteaċ sa ċeann eileThey left the airplane and went inside the other one.

result.eng: In place of the old neighbours, a new family moved in who were always causing trouble.
result.ga: In áit na seanchomharsan bhog teaghlach nua isteach a bhí i gcónaí ag cothú trioblóide
result.orig: In áit na seanchomharsan bhog teaghlach nua isteach a bhí i gcónaí ag cothú trioblóide
result.html: In áit na seanchomharsan bhog teaghlach nua isteach a bhí i gcónaí ag cothú trioblóideIn place of the old neighbours, a new family moved in who were always causing trouble.
result.ponchtml: In áit na seanċoṁarsan ḃog teaġlaċ nua isteaċ a ḃí i gcónaí ag coṫú trioblóideIn place of the old neighbours, a new family moved in who were always causing trouble.

result.eng: We were supposed to have guests coming in from several other states in the United States.
result.ga: Bhí aíonna le bheith ag teacht isteach as an iliomad stát eile sna Stáit Aontaithe
result.orig: Bhí aíonna le bheith ag teacht isteach as an iliomad stát eile sna Stáit Aontaithe
result.html: Bhí aíonna le bheith ag teacht isteach as an iliomad stát eile sna Stáit AontaitheWe were supposed to have guests coming in from several other states in the United States.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí aíonna le ḃeiṫ ag teaċt isteaċ as an iliomad stát eile sna Stáit AontaiṫeWe were supposed to have guests coming in from several other states in the United States.

result.eng: Around the time the other tower fell, reports were coming in of a jet missing in Pennsylvania.
result.ga: Thart fán am ar thit túr eile an Lárionaid bhí tuairiscí ag teacht isteach go raibh scairdeitleán ar lár i bPennsylvania
result.orig: Thart fán am ar thit túr eile an Lárionaid bhí tuairiscí ag teacht isteach go raibh scairdeitleán ar lár i bPennsylvania
result.html: Thart fán am ar thit túr eile an Lárionaid bhí tuairiscí ag teacht isteach go raibh scairdeitleán ar lár i bPennsylvaniaAround the time the other tower fell, reports were coming in of a jet missing in Pennsylvania.
result.ponchtml: Ṫart fán am ar ṫit túr eile an Lárionaid ḃí tuairiscí ag teaċt isteaċ go raiḃ scairdeitleán ar lár i bPennsylvaniaAround the time the other tower fell, reports were coming in of a jet missing in Pennsylvania.

result.eng: Four weeks after the attacks American forces carried out an invasion i to Afghanistan.
result.ga: Ceithre seachtainí i ndiaidh na n-ionsaithe rinne fórsaí Mheiriceá ionruathar isteach san Afganastáin
result.orig: Ceithre seachtainí i ndiaidh na n-ionsaithe rinne fórsaí Mheiriceá ionruathar isteach san Afganastáin
result.html: Ceithre seachtainí i ndiaidh na n-ionsaithe rinne fórsaí Mheiriceá ionruathar isteach san AfganastáinFour weeks after the attacks American forces carried out an invasion i to Afghanistan.
result.ponchtml: Ceiṫre seaċtainí i ndiaiḋ na n-ionsaiṫe rinne fórsaí Ṁeiriceá ionruaṫar isteaċ san AfganastáinFour weeks after the attacks American forces carried out an invasion i to Afghanistan.

result.eng: I had to undergo a close examination of my retina and my fingerprints, like every non-American citizen on his way into the country.
result.ga: Rinneadh scrúdú iomlán ar mo reitine agus ar mo mhéarlorga mar a dhéantar le gach éinne nach saoránach Meiriceánach é ar a bhealach isteach sa tír
result.orig: Rinneadh scrúdú iomlán ar mo reitine agus ar mo mhéarlorga mar a dhéantar le gach éinne nach saoránach Meiriceánach é ar a bhealach isteach sa tír
result.html: Rinneadh scrúdú iomlán ar mo reitine agus ar mo mhéarlorga mar a dhéantar le gach éinne nach saoránach Meiriceánach é ar a bhealach isteach sa tírI had to undergo a close examination of my retina and my fingerprints, like every non-American citizen on his way into the country.
result.ponchtml: Rinneaḋ scrúdú iomlán ar mo reitine agus ar mo ṁéarlorga mar a ḋéantar le gaċ éinne naċ saoránaċ Meiriceánaċ é ar a ḃealaċ isteaċ sa tírI had to undergo a close examination of my retina and my fingerprints, like every non-American citizen on his way into the country.

result.eng: As the country spread out west, more states joined the union that did not accept slavery.
result.ga: Mar a leath an tír siar amach tháinig níos mó stáit isteach san aontacht nár ghlac le sclábhaíocht
result.orig: Mar a leath an tír siar amach tháinig níos mó stáit isteach san aontacht nár ghlac le sclábhaíocht
result.html: Mar a leath an tír siar amach tháinig níos mó stáit isteach san aontacht nár ghlac le sclábhaíochtAs the country spread out west, more states joined the union that did not accept slavery.
result.ponchtml: Mar a leaṫ an tír siar amaċ ṫáinig níos mó stáit isteaċ san aontaċt nár ġlac le scláḃaíoċtAs the country spread out west, more states joined the union that did not accept slavery.

result.eng: Upon entering the schoolhouse he looked around him in panic.
result.ga: Ar a dhul isteach go teach na scoile dó d'amharc sé go scaollmhar ar gach taobh de
result.orig: Ar a dhul isteach go teach na scoile dó d'amharc sé go scaollmhar ar gach taobh de

result.ponchtml: Ar a ḋul isteaċ go teaċ na scoile dó d'aṁarc sé go scaollṁar ar gaċ taoḃ deUpon entering the schoolhouse he looked around him in panic.

result.eng: How did you spend the day, child?
result.ga: Goidé mar a chuir tú isteach an lá a leanbh
result.orig: Goidé mar a chuir tú isteach an lá a leanbh
result.html: Goidé mar a chuir tú isteach an lá a leanbhHow did you spend the day, child?
result.ponchtml: Goidé mar a ċuir tú isteaċ an lá a leanḃHow did you spend the day, child?

result.eng: At that point, the man of the house came in with a panicked expression.
result.ga: Leis sin isteach le fear an tí agus cuma scaollmhar air
result.orig: Leis sin isteach le fear an tí agus cuma scaollmhar air
result.html: Leis sin isteach le fear an tí agus cuma scaollmhar airAt that point, the man of the house came in with a panicked expression.
result.ponchtml: Leis sin isteaċ le fear an tí agus cuma scaollṁar airAt that point, the man of the house came in with a panicked expression.
